attributes.action: We ask the Administration to declare Pakistan, State Sponsor of Terrorism
attributes.additional_details: Attacks in india and manymore countries in the world.
attributes.background: "This petition is important to the people of United Kingdom, India and many other countries which are continuously affected by Pakistan-sponsored terrorism,"

rejection.details:
“State Sponsors of Terrorism” is a designation used by the Department of State in the United States of America. This designation is not used in this way by the UK Government.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take a specific action to address your concerns about Pakistan.
